EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_ATR.201711_Global_Email_Jetwave_ATR_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Wi-Fi Up and Running at the Speed of Flight! ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> From Zero to Fast Wi-Fi in 4 Days! <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uNx93ansQ1I]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Lufthansa was among the first airlines in the world to select Honeywell’s JetWave hardware, which exclusively enables Inmarsat’s GX Aviation service. Lufthansa’s engineers developed methods to install the new solution in as fast as 4 days! Learn how your airline can give your passengers the in-flight Wi-Fi they want with the efficiency you need. Read about the Lufthansa’s JetWave installation here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2017/may/latest-global-high-speed-wi-fi-equipment-on-your-aircraft-as-fast-as-4-days]]>.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
